Package net.minecraft.network.chat

Class MutableComponent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.network.chat.MutableComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Message, net.minecraft.network.chat.FormattedText, Iterable<Component>
public class MutableComponent  extends Object implements Component
Represents a Component that contains mutable content.
